text:
THIS A BANNER FOR THE SAME STORY I AM REQUESTING THE POSTER FOR

I was thinking it could consist of light blue grunge textures blended out together with the text in the middle. The fcs are Ciara Bravo and Victoria Justice, so, I want them to be separated (each being on a different side) and facing each other 

Or

A more simple idea is to have a lake background with fog etc. above it. The fcs can be on a side with the text on the other.
